localString.value: Hearty billows fan the forge-borne flames. The air is blisteringly hot, leaving you feel light-headed and not quite yourself.
This sturdy blacksmith's anvil bears the dented sheen of long use. Something in you wonders what great weapons and armor have been shaped upon its well-worn surface.
This sturdy blacksmith's anvil bears the dented sheen of long use. Something in you wonders what great weapons and armor have been shaped upon its well-worn surface.
Hearty billows fan the forge-borne flames. The air is blisteringly hot, leaving you feel light-headed and not quite yourself.
This is a jeweler's desk used for making jewelry.
This is a jeweler's desk used for making jewelry.
The fire crackles and burns, consuming everything within its scorching heat.
The fire burns strong, fanned anew with each gust of air.
The fire is small and slow-burning. It leaves behind a small scattering of ash.

The fire burns strong, fanned anew with each gust of air.
The fire crackles and burns, consuming everything within its scorching heat.
